snippet: Gary Cee reports in from a centrally located dwelling.
abstract: Gary Cee reports in from a centrally located dwelling.
lead_paragraph: TUESDAY'S PUZZLE - I already know what you're thinking. You're thinking that TOILET PAPER would have made a spiffy theme entry. I agree. Unfortunately, the long theme entries here are 10s, not 11s, so I'm guessing the bathroom tissue got flushed (sorry).
